import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Clothing from "../../../components/Clothing"; import { clothingList, dishdashaLength, dressLength, garmentLength, hasDressSleeve, hasOther, hasShirt, hasShirtSleeve, hasSleepwearSleeve, hasSpecialOrder, upperMeasurements, needsSleeve, shortsLength, lowerMeasurements, isBottom, hasBackWidth, hasAlterations, isCoverall, } from "../../../utilities"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import UnitInput from "../../../components/UnitInput"; const MeasurementsForm = ({ authorizedUser, clothingOptions, setClothingOptions, setDishdashaLength, setDishdashaFrontHeight, setDishdashaBackHeight, shirtType, setShirtType, setGarmentLength, setCoverallLength, setPantsLength, setShortsLength, setDressLength, setCollar, setShoulders, setSleeve, setShirtSleeve, setDressSleeve, setDescription, setSleepwearSleeve, setChest, setBelly, setWaist, setHips, setArmHole, setBicepTricep, loading, setElbow, setWrist, setInseam, setThigh, setCalf, setLegFoot, setBackWidth, setBackHeight, setFrontChestWidth, setSpecialOrder, setAlterations, setNotes, }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [unitType, setUnitType] = useState(false); const [values, setValues] = useState({}); const handleInputChange = (name, value) => { setValues((prevValues) => ({ ...prevValues, [name]: value, })); console.log(values); }; useEffect(() => { const numberInputs = document.querySelectorAll("input [type='number']"); numberInputs.forEach((element) => { if (unitType === "Inches") { element.value *= 2.54; } else { element.value /= 2.54; } }); }, [unitType]); return ( <>

)} {clothingOptions.length > 0 && hasShirt(clothingOptions) && (

{ setShirtType(() => "Long Sleeve"); }} /> { setShirtType(() => "Short Sleeve"); }} /> { setShirtType(() => "Polo"); }} /> { setShirtType(() => "T-Shirt"); }} />
)}
{dishdashaLength(clothingOptions) && ( <>
setDishdashaLength(e.target.value)} />
setDishdashaFrontHeight(e.target.value)} />
setDishdashaBackHeight(e.target.value)} />
)} {garmentLength(clothingOptions) && (
setGarmentLength(e.target.value)} />
)} {isCoverall(clothingOptions) && (
setCoverallLength(e.target.value)} />
)} {isBottom(clothingOptions) && ( <>

setCalf(e.target.value)} />
setLegFoot(e.target.value)} />
)} {shortsLength(clothingOptions) && (

)} {dressLength(clothingOptions) && (
setDressLength(e.target.value)} />
)} {hasDressSleeve(clothingOptions) && (
setDressSleeve(e.target.value)} />
)} {needsSleeve(clothingOptions) && (

)} {hasShirtSleeve(clothingOptions) && (
setShirtSleeve(e.target.value)} />
)} {hasSleepwearSleeve(clothingOptions) && (
setSleepwearSleeve(e.target.value)} />
)} {upperMeasurements(clothingOptions) && ( <>
setCollar(e.target.value)} />
setShoulders(e.target.value)} />
setChest(e.target.value)} />
setBelly(e.target.value)} />
setArmHole(e.target.value)} />
setBicepTricep(e.target.value)} />
setElbow(e.target.value)} />
setWrist(e.target.value)} />
)} {lowerMeasurements(clothingOptions) && ( <>
setWaist(e.target.value)} />
setHips(e.target.value)} />
)} {hasBackWidth(clothingOptions) && ( <>
setBackWidth(e.target.value)} />
setBackHeight(e.target.value)} />
setFrontChestWidth(e.target.value)} />
)}
{hasSpecialOrder(clothingOptions) && (
)} {hasAlterations(clothingOptions) && (
)} {hasOther(clothingOptions) && (
)}
); }; export default MeasurementsForm;
